name: Celestial Spirit
languages: Celestial, understands the languages you speak

action.name: Multiattack
text: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

action.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 2d6 + 2 + the spell's level radiant damage.

action.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains 1d10 temporary hit points.

action.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
text: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to 2d8 + the spell's level.
